title: Code device
m_descr: Create virtual device based on JavaScript code.
l_getterPollInterval_sensorBinary: Interval in seconds between polling requests
h_getterPollInterval_sensorBinary: Empty or 0 to disable periodical requests (explicit update command will still initiate request process)
l_getterPollInterval_sensorMultilevel: Interval in seconds between polling requests
h_getterPollInterval_sensorMultilevel: Empty or 0 to disable periodical requests (explicit update command will still initiate request process)
l_getterPollInterval_switchBinary: Interval in seconds between polling requests
h_getterPollInterval_switchBinary: Empty or 0 to disable periodical requests (explicit update command will still initiate request process)
l_getterPollInterval_switchMultilevel: Interval in seconds between polling requests
h_getterPollInterval_switchMultilevel: Empty or 0 to disable periodical requests (explicit update command will still initiate request process)
